headline: Musk's SpaceX Said to Weigh Tie-Up With Tesla or xAI
summary: SpaceX is said to be considering a potential merger with Tesla or xAI, as Elon Musk weighs how to consolidate his empire. Bloomberg Tech's Ed Ludlow discusses what's at stake on "Bloomberg: The Asia Trade."

content.title: Musk's SpaceX Said to Weigh Tie-Up With Tesla or xAI
content.description: SpaceX is said to be considering a potential merger with Tesla or xAI, as Elon Musk weighs how to consolidate his empire. Bloomberg Tech's Ed Ludlow discusses what's at stake on "Bloomberg: The Asia Trade."
content.summary: SpaceX is said to be considering a potential merger with Tesla or xAI, as Elon Musk weighs how to consolidate his empire. Bloomberg Tech's Ed Ludlow discusses what's at stake on "Bloomberg: The Asia Trade."

headline: SpaceX in merger talks with other Musk companies ahead of IPO
summary:
STORY: SpaceX is exploring deals with other companies helmed by Elon Musk.

The rocket maker is in discussions to merge with artificial intelligence company xAI ahead of a blockbuster public offering planned for this year.

The combination would bring Musk’s rockets, Starlink satellites, social media platform X and Grok chatbot under one roof.

That's according to a person briefed on the matter and two regulatory filings.

SpaceX is also considering a merger with Musk's electric vehicle maker Tesla, according to Bloomberg.

The world's richest man is CEO of SpaceX and xAI, which controls X.

He also runs Tesla, tunnel firm The Boring Company, and neurotechnology outfit Neuralink.

Neither Musk nor any of the firms responded to requests for comment.

Shares in Tesla rose 3% in after-hours trade Thursday.

Some of its shareholders have long advocated bringing Musk's companies together.

Stock Trader Network chief market strategist Dennis Dick says a major risk thesis for Tesla is that "Musk is spreading himself out too much." 

For SpaceX, a massive deal could complicate its IPO plans.

But it might add momentum to efforts to launch data centers into orbit, a key goal for Musk in the escalating AI race. 

xAI shares would be exchanged for SpaceX shares if the two merged. 

A Reuters source says no final agreement has been signed and the deal timing and structure remain fluid.

headline: Tesla Reorients From Premium EVs To Optimus Robots And xAI Future
summary: Tesla is shifting away from Model S and Model X production to focus on mass manufacturing its Optimus humanoid robots, repurposing its California factory for this new line. The company is expanding its autonomous technology efforts and committing $2b to Elon Musk's AI startup xAI. Rumors are circulating about a potential merger between Tesla and either SpaceX or xAI, which could reshape the group structure around AI, robotics, and autonomy. Tesla, NasdaqGS:TSLA, is trading at $416.56, with...

headline: DoorDash Extends Everyday Commerce Reach With Hibbett Deal And AI Hire
summary: DoorDash announced a nationwide partnership with Hibbett to offer on demand delivery of athletic footwear, apparel, and gear across the US. The company also appointed Milan Kovac, a former robotics and AI leader at Tesla and Boston Dynamics, to its board of directors. For investors watching NasdaqGS:DASH, these updates land as the stock trades around $207.68, with a 1 year return of 10.1%. Over a 3 year period, the return is about 3.3x, while the 5 year return is 9.7%, reflecting a company...
